mapper.select: select id,cnum,cart.productnum,camount,productname,price,point,productfile.filename from cart inner join product on(cart.productnum = product.productnum) inner join productfile on(cart.productnum=productfile.num) where id=#{id} and productfile.firstfile=0 order by cnum desc

delete from cart where cnum in
#{cnum}
